message:
“A lighthouse doesn’t know upon who it shines, people just sail their ship toward it,” he said. “I met these people who are human lighthouses, they are everyday heroes.” - You never know how a small act of kindness may shape a person’s life.
https://buff.ly/2JxWYBO
